text: The book “White Too Long” marshals data to lay out a startling case that “the more racist attitudes a person holds, the more likely he or she is to identify as a white Christian.” https://t.co/exuj1VBt2i

text: Studies suggest that relying on will power is hopeless. Instead, we must find strategies that don’t require us to be strong. https://t.co/B3cMp6cRik

text: The elaborate nail stylings made popular by Black women have been both derided and appropriated. In a new documentary, they’re honored as art. https://t.co/Dmiz1J6t4e

text: If you are feeling especially bummed out, fully exhausted by the contents of your home or your own mind, take a moment to watch the 21-year-old twins Tim and Fred Williams listen to Phil Collins’s “In the Air Tonight,” from 1981. https://t.co/QPBSB5z4oh
